sentences.english: Results Cerebrospinal rhinorrhea 14 from ethmoid sinus, 2 from sphenoid sinus.
sentences.chinese: 结果脑脊液漏14例位于筛窦，2例位于蝶窦。

sentences.english: Transsphenoidal surgery is currently the primary therapeutic option for Cushing s disease.
sentences.chinese: 一旦明确库欣病的诊断，经蝶窦手术是首选治疗方法。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the diagnostic accuracy of non pituitary lesions in sphenoidal sinus and sellar area.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高蝶窦鞍区非垂体源性占位性病变的诊断水平。

sentences.english: Transsphenoidal microsurgical removal of 104cases of GH-secreting adenoma are reported.
sentences.chinese: 报告104例经蝶窦显微外科切除垂体生长激素腺瘤。

sentences.english: All the patients underwent thin-layer coronal and axial CT scanning.
sentences.chinese: 全部患者均行蝶窦冠状位及水平位薄层CT扫描。

sentences.english: Nasal endoscopy surgery was very effective to the treatment of fungus ball in sphenoid sinus.
sentences.chinese: 蝶窦霉菌病可采用鼻内窥镜下蝶窦手术。

sentences.english: Nasal endoscopy surgery was very effective to the treatment of fungus ball in sphenoid sinus.
sentences.chinese: 蝶窦霉菌病可采用鼻内窥镜下蝶窦手术。

sentences.english: This paper described a technique, "Transnasal endoscopicsphenoid sinus surgery ", that had been used for 28 patients.
sentences.chinese: 应用内窥镜鼻窦外科技术施行蝶窦区域的手术28例。

sentences.english: In contrast, pneumocele of the sphenoid sinus is a rare lesion.
sentences.chinese: 相反，蝶窦的膨出是一种少见的病变。

sentences.english: Sphenoid sinus dilated forward surrounding manifests as parasphenoid sinus air cavities in lateral projection.
sentences.chinese: 蝶窦向周围扩展有时在侧位片上表现为蝶窦傍气腔。

sentences.english: Sphenoid sinus dilated forward surrounding manifests as parasphenoid sinus air cavities in lateral projection.
sentences.chinese: 蝶窦向周围扩展有时在侧位片上表现为蝶窦傍气腔。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the operative method and the therapeutic effect of isolated sphenoid sinus diseases under endoscope.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨鼻内镜下处理孤立性蝶窦病变的方法及疗效。

sentences.english: Conclusions The transsphenoidal microsurgery is optimal treatment in children and adolescents with Cushing's disease.
sentences.chinese: 结论经蝶窦显微外科手术是治疗库欣病的最佳方法。

sentences.english: Objective To correctly diagnose and treat isolated sphenoid sinus disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高对孤立性蝶窦病变的诊断率和治疗率。

sentences.english: When disease involves the sphenoid, the sinus can be penetrated either intranasally or through the posterior ethmoid.
sentences.chinese: 当病变累及蝶窦，可以经鼻内和后组筛窦进入蝶窦。

sentences.english: When disease involves the sphenoid, the sinus can be penetrated either intranasally or through the posterior ethmoid.
sentences.chinese: 当病变累及蝶窦，可以经鼻内和后组筛窦进入蝶窦。
